description:
In this classic pair matching game players must flip over cards to reveal matching pairs of two.
The game can be played alone or with up to four players.
name: Animal Pairs - Matching & Concentration Game for Toddlers & Kids
intro: Find matching pairs in this popular card game. Play alone or with up to four players. Customize the playfield from 2x2 to up to 8x8 cards. Suitable for all ages.
